relation: Orange coast college is a great school. Professors are smart and intelligent. The only thing I hated was parking, and not enough classes offered!
pageTitle: Orange Coast College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {64094=I am at the one in riverside but you had no selection for them. its so far a very familiar environment, so i feel comfortable here. I finish up in november November and am eager to start working., 265550=I am comparing the price to a four year college or university. The price is $46 per unit which is extremely affordable. One year, with books and carrying an average 15 unit load, costs around $2000., 268201=Orange Coast College has been a great place to go to school because they offer excellent two year degree and certificate programs. Also because the cost is very inexpensive, roughly $2000 per year including books(averaging 15 units per semester). textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here Its right next to Newport Beach/Huntington Beach and South Coast Plaza mall. Its located in a safe area with a good community atmosphere. The weather is just great warm all year long and no snow. You get to meet lots of new people and that is always a plus. Am learning a lot Depending what you want to Major in or what your course is there are some teachers that are great and some that arent as great. I suggest you use ratemyprofessor.com before actually signing up for a class. Other than that most of the teachers hear at OCC seems to be great, but you just got to land on the right teacher. Login to rate or flag the reviews Sarah from Westminster, CA 08/26/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 95 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Great for disciplined
